 November 25, 2022 

 NGEx Minerals Reports Q3 2022 Results and Provides a Corporate Update 

 Read More : NGEx Minerals Reports Q3 2022 Results and Provides a Corporate Update 

 

 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 



 
 News  



 
 

 
 
 September 26, 2024 

 NGEx Announces Exploration Plan for Lunahuasi 



 
 Read more : NGEx Announces Exploration Plan for Lunahuasi 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 August 12, 2024 

 NGEx Reports Q2 2024 Results; 2023-2024 Lunahuasi Drill Program Successfully Expands High-Grade Mineralization and Confirms Significant Scale Potential 



 
 Read more : NGEx Reports Q2 2024 Results; 2023-2024 Lunahuasi Drill Program Successfully Expands High-Grade Mineralization and Confirms Significant Scale Potential 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 June 27, 2024 

 NGEx Announces Voting Results from Annual General and Special Meeting 



 
 Read more : NGEx Announces Voting Results from Annual General and Special Meeting 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 June 19, 2024 

 NGEx Reports Lunahuasi Step-Out Drilling Intersects 726.5m at 1.66% Copper Equivalent (“CuEq”) and 58.1m at 6.04% CuEq, including 4.8m at 41.12% CuEq, Significantly Expanding High-Grade Mineralization 



 
 Read more : NGEx Reports Lunahuasi Step-Out Drilling Intersects 726.5m at 1.66% Copper Equivalent (“CuEq”) and 58.1m at 6.04% CuEq, including 4.8m at 41.12% CuEq, Significantly Expanding High-Grade Mineralization 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 May 13, 2024 

 NGEx Reports Q1 2024 Results; Demonstrates Size and Grade Potential at Lunahuasi with Successful 2023-2024 Drill Program 



 
 Read more : NGEx Reports Q1 2024 Results; Demonstrates Size and Grade Potential at Lunahuasi with Successful 2023-2024 Drill Program 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 May 9, 2024 

 NGEx Drills 429.4 Metres at 2.31% Copper Equivalent, Including 102.7 Metres at 4.26% Copper Equivalent and 13.2 Metres at 16.24% Copper Equivalent at Lunahuasi 



 
 Read more : NGEx Drills 429.4 Metres at 2.31% Copper Equivalent, Including 102.7 Metres at 4.26% Copper Equivalent and 13.2 Metres at 16.24% Copper Equivalent at Lunahuasi 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 April 30, 2024 

 NGEX DRILLS 509 METRES AT 1.33% COPPER EQUIVALENT AND 328 METRES AT 1.10% COPPER EQUIVALENT AT LUNAHUASI, CONFIRMING EXTENSIVE PORPHYRY-RELATED STOCKWORK MINERALIZATION IN ADDITION TO EXTENSIONS OF PREVIOUSLY REPORTED HIGH-GRADE COPPER-GOLD-SILVER VEINS 



 
 Read more : NGEX DRILLS 509 METRES AT 1.33% COPPER EQUIVALENT AND 328 METRES AT 1.10% COPPER EQUIVALENT AT LUNAHUASI, CONFIRMING EXTENSIVE PORPHYRY-RELATED STOCKWORK MINERALIZATION IN ADDITION TO EXTENSIONS OF PREVIOUSLY REPORTED HIGH-GRADE COPPER-GOLD-SILVER VEINS
